recipe_name: Chicken and sweetcorn stir fry chowder
author: Tony Tobin
method: Heat the oil in a pan over a medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and fry for 2-3 minutes to soften.  Add the chicken pieces and fry for 3-4 minutes until they start to colour, then add the sweetcorn, mangetout and pepper, frying for a further 2-3 minutes.  Add the stock, and leave to simmer on a medium heat for 8-10 minutes, until everything is cooked through and the liquid has slightly reduced.   To serve, ladle into a bowl and eat piping hot with bread.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  ½ onion, finely chopped,  1 garlic clove, crushed,  ½ skinned chicken breast, cut into strips,  100g/3½oz canned sweetcorn,  55g/2oz mangetout ,  ½ orange pepper, cut into strips,  300ml/10fl oz chicken stock,  bread to serve
